api_access_key.description: A GUID identifying the API key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

api_secret_key.description: A base64 encoded secret key used to authenticate with the StrongDM API.

host.description: The host and port of the StrongDM API endpoint.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Service.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

email.description: The User's email address. Must be unique.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

account_id.description: The id of the account of this AccountAttachment.

role_id.description: The id of the attached role of this AccountAttachment.

account_id.description: The id of the attached role of this AccountGrant.

resource_id.description: The id of the composite role of this AccountGrant.

bind_address.description:
The hostname/port tuple which the gateway daemon will bind to.
 If not provided on create, set to "0.0.0.0:<listen_address_port>".

listen_address.description: The public hostname/port tuple at which the gateway will be accessible to clients.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Gateway. Node names must include only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, underscores, or other special characters). Generated if not provided on create.

tags.description: Tags is a map of key, value pairs.

name.description: Unique human-readable name of the Relay. Node names must include only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, underscores, or other special characters). Generated if not provided on create.
